name: Pastel Planets
description:
This is my first game jam and this is what I've made. I found the theme 'As above, so below' very challenging, but I managed to finish it and have something to show. Feedback is welcomed, I would like to make some minor improvements for stability and maybe add some more maps!

External Files:
Sound effect from https://www.weloveindies.com/

Stock Music provided by PolkadotFlowersMusic
